name: Ghost Story (Edenstudent)
description:
Ghost Story is short game I worked on to try and flesh out a unique idea; a platformer where the player doesn't directly interact with the platforms.

The player will control the main character as she tries to rise out of the underworld, gifted with a demonic power, nothing will stop her.

The game contains 30 levels of platforming puzzles where the player must destroy the spirits to move up to the next level before time runs out. Every 5 levels will unlock a new cutscene, revealing more of the story.

Controls:

WASD - move

SPACE - use power

Game page here: https://echoesoflotus.wixsite.com/home/ghost-story

Music by DDRKirby: https://ddrkirbyisq.bandcamp.com/track/lullaby-of-flame-lullaby-of-deserted-hell
